text: How to rotate text which is there in HSSFTextbox class of Apache POI API? It seems cannot do as my expecting.
creator: zhongtuo19852985@gmail.com
zhongtuo19852985@gmail.com
text: How to rotate text which is there in HSSFTextbox class of Apache POI API?

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
You can't do that - current implementation does not support rotation of text.

Please ask questions on the mailing lists, see http://poi.apache.org/mailinglists.html
Bugzilla is not the place for user questions, they belong on the poi-user mailing list
